verses.roman:
sarva-bhāve kaila kṛṣṇa ei ta' niścaya
hena-kāle āila yugāvatāra-samaya

synonyms: sarva-bhāve—in all respects; kaila—made; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; ei—this; ta'-certainly; niścaya—decision; hena-kāle—at this time; āila—came; yuga-avatāra—of the incarnation according to the age; samaya—the time.
translation: In this way Lord Kṛṣṇa came to a decision. Simultaneously, the time came for the incarnation of the age.
